SA15ratksanu:1_0: (77.4) vyatirekātmikā vyāptir ākṣiptānvayarūpiṇī / vaidharmyavati dṛṣṭānte sattvahetor ihocyate /
SA15ratksanu:2_0: (77.6) yat sat tat kṣaṇikam / yathā ghaṭaḥ / santaś cāmī vivādāspadībhūtāḥ padārthā iti svabhāvahetuḥ /
SA15ratksanu:5_0: (77.11) yasya kramākramau na vidyete na tasyārthakriyāsāmarthyam /
SA15ratksanu:5_1: yathā śaśaviṣāṇasya / na vidyete cākṣaṇikasya kramākramāv iti vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:6_6: abhede hi prathama eva kṣaṇe śaktatvād /
SA15ratksanu:6_7: bhāvino 'pi kāryasya karaṇaprasaṅge kathaṃ kāryāntarakaraṇe kramāntarāvakāśaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:8_0: (77.20) tad ayam akṣaṇike dharmiṇi kramākramābhāvalakṣaṇo hetur nāsiddho vaktavyaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:11_0: (78.3) yenaiva hi pratyakṣātmanā pramāṇenāparaprakārābhāvād vidhibhūtābhyāṃ kramākramābhyāṃ vidhibhūtasyārthakriyāsāmarthyasya vyāptiḥ prasādhitā,
SA15ratksanu:11_2: na hi dahanādinā dhūmāder vyāptisādhakapramāṇād aparaṃ dhūmādyabhāvena dahanādyabhāvasya vyāptisādhakaṃ kiñcit pramāṇaṃ śaraṇabhūtam asti /
SA15ratksanu:11_3: tasmād vidhyor eva vyāptisādhakaṃ pramāṇam abhāvayor api vyāptisādhakam iti nyāyasya duratikramatvāt sattvābhāvena kramākramābhāvo vyāpta eveti nānaikāntika ity anavadyo vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:11_4: tad ayam akṣaṇikād vinivartamāṇaḥ svavyāpyaṃ sattvaṃ nivartya kṣaṇike viśrāmayatīti sattvahetoḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhir apy anavadyā.
SA15ratksanu:12_1: asyāpy anekadoṣaduṣṭatvāt / tathā hi na tāvad ayaṃ prasaṅga hetuḥ /
SA15ratksanu:12_6: apratītatvād vā / pratītir hi pratyakṣeṇānumānena vikalpamātreṇa vā syāt /
SA15ratksanu:13_0: (79.1) prathamapakṣadvaye sākṣātpāramparyeṇa vā svapratītilakṣaṇārthakāritve maulaḥ sādhāraṇo hetuḥ vyāpakānupalambhaś ca svarūpāsiddhaḥ syāt /
SA15ratksanu:14_0: (79.4) antimapakṣe tu na kaścid dhetur anāśrayaḥ syāt /
SA15ratksanu:15_0: (79.6) api ca, tat kalpanājñānaṃ pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvi vā syāt,
SA15ratksanu:17_0: (79.9) tṛītye tu na sarvadā 'kṣaṇikasattāniṣedhaḥ / tadarpitasaṃskārābhāve tat smaraṇāyogāt /
SA15ratksanu:19_0: (79.11) pañcame ca tadviṣayasyābhāvo na tāvad pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati /
SA15ratksanu:19_1: akṣaṇikātmanaḥ sarvadaiva tvanmate 'pratyakṣatvāt na cānumānatas tadabhāvas tatpratibaddhaliṅgān upalam bhādityāśrayāsiddhis tāvad uddhatā /
SA15ratksanu:20_3: tathā hi kramisahakāryapekṣayā kramikāryakāritvan tāvad aviruddham /
SA15ratksanu:21_2: tadvaikalyaṃ cāsāmarthyam / na ca tayor āvirbhāvatirobhāvābhyān tadvataḥ kā cit kṣatiḥ /
SA15ratksanu:21_3: tasya tābhyām anyatvāt / tat kathaṃ sahakāriṇo 'napekṣa kāryakaraṇaprasaṅga iti /
SA15ratksanu:22_2: na ca kāryotpattihetuḥ / yasmād dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nijam āgantukaṃ ca sahakāryantaram,
SA15ratksanu:22_3: tato 'kṣaṇikasyāpi kramavat sahakārinānātvād api kramavat kāryanānātvopapatter aśakyaṃ bhāvānām pratikṣaṇam anyonyatvam upapādayitum iti /
SA15ratksanu:23_1: ataḥ prathamakāla evāśeṣāṇi kāryāṇi kuryād iti cet /
SA15ratksanu:24_0: (79.26) tad idaṃ mātā me vandhyety ādivat svavacanavirodhād ayuktam /
SA15ratksanu:24_1: yo hi uttarakāryajananasvabhāvaḥ sa katham ādau tat kāryaṃ kuryāt /
SA15ratksanu:24_3: na hi nīlotpādanasvabhāvaḥ pītādikam api karotīti /
SA15ratksanu:25_0: (80.1) vācaspatir api paṭhati / nanv ayam akṣaṇikaḥ svarūpeṇa kāryaṃ janayati /
SA15ratksanu:25_1: tac cāsya svarūpaṃ tṛtīyādiṣiva kṣaṇeṣu dvitīye 'pi kṣaṇe sad iti tadāpi janayet /
SA15ratksanu:25_2: akurvan vā tṛtīyādiṣv api na kurvīta /
SA15ratksanu:25_3: tasya tādāvasthyāt / atādavasthye vā tad evāsya kṣaṇikatvam /
SA15ratksanu:26_0: (80.4) atrocyate / satyaṃ svarūpeṇa kāryaṃ janayati na tu tenaiva /
SA15ratksanu:26_4: tathaiva laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ sampratipatter iti na kramikāryakāritvapakṣoktadoṣāvasaraḥ /
SA15ratksanu:27_1: ye hi kāryam utpāditavanto dravyaviśeṣās teṣāṃ vyāpārasya niyatakāryotpādanasamarthasya niṣpādite kārye 'nuvartamāneṣv api teṣu dravyeṣu nivṛttārthād ūnā sāmagrī jāyate /
SA15ratksanu:27_3: na hi daṇḍādayaḥ svabhāvenaiva kartāro yenāmi niṣpatter ārabhya kāryaṃ vidadhyuḥ /
SA15ratksanu:27_4: kiṃ tarhi vyāpārāveśinaḥ / na ceyatā svarūpeṇa na kartāraḥ /
SA15ratksanu:28_1: na ca sattvābhāva iti sandigdhavyatireko 'py ayaṃ vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:28_2: na hi kramākramābhyām anyasya prakārasyābhāvaḥ siddhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:29_1: adṛśyatve tu nāsattāniścayo viprakarṣiṇām iti na kramākramābhyām arthakriyāsāmarthyasya vyāptisiddhiḥ /
SA15ratksanu:30_0: (80.19) kiṃ ca dṛśyādṛśyasahakāripratyayasākalyavataḥ kramayaugapadyasyātyantaparokṣatvāt tena vyāptaṃ sattvam api parokṣam eveti na tāvat pratibandhaḥ pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati /
SA15ratksanu:31_0: (80.22) api ca kramākramābhyām arthakriyākāritvaṃ vyāptam ity atisubhāṣitam /
SA15ratksanu:31_3: kramākramābhyāṃ vyāptim iti tu bruvatā vyāpter evābhāvaḥ pradarśito bhavati /
SA15ratksanu:31_4: na hi bhavaty agnir dhūmabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ vyāpta iti /
SA15ratksanu:32_0: (80.26) api ca kim idaṃ bādhakam akṣaṇikānām asattāṃ sādhayati /
SA15ratksanu:33_0: (80.28) na pūrvo vikalpaḥ / uktakrameṇa hetor āśrayāsiddhatvāt /
SA15ratksanu:34_0: (80.29) na ca dvitīyaḥ / yato vyāpakanivṛttisahitā vyāpyanivṛttir vyatirekaśabdasyārthaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:34_1: sā ca yadi pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate tadā taddhetuḥ syād iti sattvam anaikāntikam /
SA15ratksanu:34_3: atha sā vikalpyate tadā pūrvoktakrameṇa pañcadhā vikalpya vikalpo dūṣaṇīyaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:35_0: (81.1) ata eva na tṛtīyo 'pi vikalpaḥ / vyatirekāsiddhau sambandhāsiddheḥ /
SA15ratksanu:36_0: (81.2) kiṃ ca na bhūtalavad atrākṣaṇiko dharmi dṛśyate /
SA15ratksanu:36_1: na ca svabhāvānupalambhe vyāpakānupalambhaḥ kasya cit dṛśyasya pratipattim antareṇāntarbhāvayituṃ śakyata iti /
SA15ratksanu:37_2: ubhayadharmatve cānaikāntikatvam iti na trayīṃ doṣajātim atipatati /
SA15ratksanu:38_0: (81.6) yat punar uktam akṣaṇikatve kramayaugapadyābhyām arthakriyāvirodhād iti /
SA15ratksanu:38_1: tatra virodhasiddhim anusaratā virodhy api pratipattavyaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:39_0: (81.8) pratiyogī cākṣaṇikaḥ pratīyamānaḥ pratītikāritvāt sann eva syāt ajanakasyāprameyatvāt /
SA15ratksanu:40_1: saṃvṛtisiddham api vāstavaṃ kālpanikaṃ vā syāt /
SA15ratksanu:42_0: (81.14) atha kālpanikam / tatra kiṃ virodho vāstavaḥ, kālpaniko vā / na tāvad vāstavaḥ / kalpitavirodhivirodhatvāt, vandhyāputravirodhavat / atha virodho 'pi kālpanikaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:42_1: na tarhi sattvasya vyatirekaḥ pāramārthika iti kṣaṇabhaṅgo dattajalāñjalir iti /
SA15ratksanu:44_0: (81.18) nityaṃ nāsti na vā pratītiviṣayas tenāśrayāsiddhatā hetoḥ svānubhavasya ca kṣatir ataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo 'pi ca /
SA15ratksanu:44_1: śūnyaṃ ca dvitayena sidhyati na cāsattāpi sattā yathā no nityena virodhasiddhir asatā śakṣā kramāder api /
SA15ratksanu:45_0: (81.23) atrocyate / iha vastuny api dharmidharmavyavahāro dṛṣṭo yathā gavi gotvam,
SA15ratksanu:45_2: avastuny api dharmidharmavyavahāro dṛṣṭo yathā śaśaviṣāṇe tīkṣṇatvābhāvo vandhyāputre vaktṛtvābhāvo gaganāravinde gandhābhāva ityādi /
SA15ratksanu:45_3: tatrāvastuni dharmitvaṃ nāstīti kiṃ vastudharmeṇa dharmitvaṃ nāsti /
SA15ratksanu:46_0: (81.27) prathamapakṣe siddhasādhanam / dvitīyapakṣe tu svavacanavirodhaḥ / yad āhur guravaḥ //
SA15ratksanu:47_0: (81.28) dharmasya kasya cid avastuni mānasiddhā bādhāvidhivyavahṛtiḥ kim ihāsti no vā kvāpy asti cet katham iyanti na dūṣaṇāni nāsty eva cet svavacanapratirodhasiddhiḥ /
SA15ratksanu:48_0: (82.1) avastuno dharmitvasvīkārapūrvakatvasya vyāpakasyābhāvād āśrayāsiddhidūṣaṇasyānupanyāsaprasaṅga ity arthaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:48_3: paraṃ tu pratiṣidhyata iti vyaktam idam īśvaraceṣṭitam /
SA15ratksanu:48_4: tathā hy avastuno dharmitvaṃ nāstīti vacanena dharmitvābhāvaḥ kim avastuni vidhīyata,
SA15ratksanu:48_5: anyatra vā, na vā kva cid apīti trayaḥ pakṣāḥ /
SA15ratksanu:51_0: (82.8) tṛtīyas tu pakṣo vyartha eva nirāśrayatvād iti katham avastuno dharmitvaniṣedhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:51_1: tasmād yathā pramāṇopanyāsaḥ prameyatvasvīkāra pūrvakatvena vyāptaḥ,
SA15ratksanu:51_2: vācakaśabdopanyāso vā vācyasvīkārapūrvakatvena vyāptas tathā 'vastuno dharmitvaṃ nāstīti vacanopanyāso 'vastuno dharmitvasvīkārapūrvakatvena vyāptaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:52_0: (82.11) tad yadi vacanopanyāso vyāpyadharmas tadā 'vastuno dharmitvasvīkāro 'pi vyāpakadharmo durvāraḥ /
SA15ratksanu:52_1: atha na vyāpakadharmaḥ, tadā vyāpyasyāpi vacanopanyāsasyāsambhava iti mūkataivātra balād āyāteti kathaṃ na svavacanapratirodhasiddhiḥ /
SA15ratksanu:53_0: (82.15) yad āhācāryaḥ / na hy abruvan paraṃ bodhayitum īśaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:53_1: [a]bruvan vā doṣam imaṃ parihartum iti mahati saṃkaṭe praveśaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:54_0: (82.17) avastuprastāve sahṛdayānāṃ mūkataiva yujyate iti cet /
SA15ratksanu:54_1: aho mahad vaidagdhyam / avastuprastāve svayam eva yathāśakti valgitvā bhagno mūkataiva nyāyaprāpteti paribhāyayā niḥsartum icchati /
SA15ratksanu:54_2: na cāvastuprastāvo rājadaṇḍena vinā caraṇamardanādināniṣṭimātreṇa vā pratiṣedhuṃ śakṣate /
SA15ratksanu:54_3: tataś cātrāpi kramākramabhāvasya sādhanatve sattvābhāvasya ca sādhyatve sandigdhavastubhāvasyāvastvātmano vā kṣaṇikasya dharmitvaṃ kena pratiṣidhyate /
SA15ratksanu:55_5: na tv avastudharmeṇa / vastvavastudharmeṇa vā / svavacanasyānupanyāsaprasaṅgād ity akṣaṇikasyābhāve sandehe 'pi vā 'vastudharmeṇa dharmitvam avyāhatam iti nāyam āśrayāsiddho vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:56_2: kevalam asau vyavahārāṅgabhūtā pratītir vastvavastunor ekarūpā na bhavati /
SA15ratksanu:56_4: yathā pratyakṣam anumānaṃ pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvi ca vikalpaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:56_5: avastunas tu sāmarthyābhāvād vikalpamātram eva pratītiḥ /
SA15ratksanu:56_6: vastuno hi vastubalabhāvinī pratītir yathā sākṣāt pratyakṣam,
SA15ratksanu:57_0: (83.4) na hy abhāvah kaś cid vigrahavān yaḥ sākṣātkartavyo 'pi tu vyavahartavyaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:57_1: sa ca vyavahāro vikalpād api sidhyaty eva /
SA15ratksanu:58_0: (83.6) taddharmitvapratiṣedhānubandhād ity akāmenāpi vikalpamātrasiddho 'kṣaṇikaḥ svīkartavya iti nāyam apratītatvād apy āśrayāsiddho hetur vaktavyaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:59_0: (83.9) na kaś cid dhetur anāśrayaḥ vikalpamātrasiddhasya dharmiṇaḥ sarvatra sulabhatvād iti /
SA15ratksanu:60_0: (83.10) tad asaṅgatam / vikalpamātrasiddhasya dharmiṇaḥ sarvatra sambhave 'pi vastudharmeṇa dharmitvāyogāt /
SA15ratksanu:61_0: (83.11) yathā ātmano vibhutvasādhanārtham upanyastaṃ sarvatropalabhyamānaguṇatvād iti sādhanam /
SA15ratksanu:61_2: pūrvaṃ sandigdhavastukaḥ / samarthite tu hetāv avastuka iti brūmaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:62_5: evaṃ dṛṣṭāntasyāpi vyomotpalāder dharmitvaṃ vikalpamātreṇa pratītiś cāvagantavyā /
SA15ratksanu:62_6: tad evam avastudharmāpekṣayā 'vastunodharmitvasya vikalpamātreṇa pratīteś cāpahnotum aśakyatvān nāyam āśrayāsiddho hetuḥ /
SA15ratksanu:63_0: (83.20) na caiṣa svarūpāsiddhaḥ / akṣaṇike dharmiṇi kramākramayor vyāpakayor ayogāt /
SA15ratksanu:63_1: tathā hi yadi tasya prathame kṣaṇe dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvikāryakaraṇasāmarthyam asti tadā prathamakṣaṇabhāvikāryavat dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvyam api (?) kāryaṃ kuryāt /
SA15ratksanu:64_2: na hi bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa karotīti svarūpeṇaiva karoti /
SA15ratksanu:64_3: sahakārisahitād eva tataḥ kāryotpattidarsanāt iti cet /
SA15ratksanu:65_0: (83.24) yadā tāvad amī militāḥ santaḥ kāryaṃ kurvate tadaikārthakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvam eṣām astu ko niṣeddhā /
SA15ratksanu:65_1: militair eva tu tatkāryaṃ karttavyam iti kuto labhyate /
SA15ratksanu:65_4: tasmāt sāmagrī janikā naikaṃ janakam iti sthiravādināṃ manorājyasyāpy aviṣayaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:66_0: (83.29) kiṃ kurmo dṛśyate tāvad evam iti cet /
SA15ratksanu:66_1: dṛśyatāṃ kiṃ tu pūrvasthitād eva paścāt sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭād bhāvāt kāryotpattir anyasmād eva viśiṣṭasāmagrīsamutpannāt kṣaṇād iti vivādapadam etat /
SA15ratksanu:66_2: tatra prāg api sambhave sarvadaiva kāryotpattir na vā kadā cid apīti virodham asamādhāya tad eva kāryotpattir iti sādhyānuvādamātrapravṛttaḥ kṛpām arhati /
SA15ratksanu:67_2: vistareṇa ca pratyabhijñādūṣaṇam asmābhiḥ sthirasiddhidūṣaṇe pratipāditam iti tad evāvadhāryam /
SA15ratksanu:68_1: na tu kāryotpattihetuḥ / yasmād dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ nijam āgantukaṃ ca sahakāryantaraṃ,
SA15ratksanu:68_2: tato 'kṣaṇikasyāpi kramavat sahakārinānātvād api kramavat kāryanānātvam iti cet /
SA15ratksanu:69_1: tathāpi tat prātisvikaṃ vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ sadyaḥ kriyādharmakamavaśyābhyupagantavyam /
SA15ratksanu:70_0: (84.11) na ca kāryaṃ sahakāriṇo 'pekṣata iti yuktam,
SA15ratksanu:70_1: tasyāsattvāt / hetuś ca sann api yadi svakāryaṃ na karoti,
SA15ratksanu:70_2: tadā tatkāryam eva tan na syāt /
SA15ratksanu:71_3: na hi nīlotpādanasvabhāvaḥ pītādikam api karotīti /
SA15ratksanu:72_0: (84.15) tad asaṅgatam / sthirasvabhāvatve bhāvasyottarakālam evedaṃ na pūrvakālam iti kuta etat /
SA15ratksanu:72_1: tadabhāvāc ca kāraṇam apy uttarakāryasvabhāvam ity api kutaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:73_0: (84.17) kiṃ kurmaḥ / uttarakālam eva tasya janmeti cet /
SA15ratksanu:73_2: sthiratve 'py eṣa eva svabhāvas tasya yad uttarakṣaṇa eva kāryaṃ karotīti cet /
SA15ratksanu:73_3: na, pramāṇabādhite svabhāvābhyupagamāyogād iti na tāvad akṣaṇikasya kramikāryakāritvam asti /
SA15ratksanu:73_5: dvitīye 'pi kṣaṇe kārakasvarūpasadbhāve punar api kāryakaraṇaprasaṅgāt /
SA15ratksanu:74_0: (84.21) kārye niṣpanne tadviṣayavyāpārābhāvād ūnā sāmagrī na niṣpāditaṃ niṣpādayed iti cet /
SA15ratksanu:74_1: na, sāmagrīsambhavāsambhavayor api sadyaḥ kriyākārakasvarūpasambhave janakatvam avadhāryam iti prāg eva pratipādanāt /
SA15ratksanu:74_2: kāryasya hi niṣpāditatvāt punaḥ kartum aśakyatvam eva kāraṇam asamartham āvedayati /
SA15ratksanu:75_0: (84.23) tad ayam akṣaṇike kramākramikāryakāritvābhāvo na siddhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:75_1: na ca kramākramābhyām aparaprakārasambhavo yena tābhyām avyāptau sandigdhavyatireko hetuḥ syāt /
SA15ratksanu:75_6: tathātīndriyasya sahakāriṇo 'dṛśyatve 'pyayogavyavacchedena dṛśyasahakārisahitasya sattvasya dṛśyakramākramābhyāṃ vyāptiḥ pratyakṣād eva sidhyati /
SA15ratksanu:75_7: evaṃ kramākramābhyām arthakriyākāritvaṃ vyāptam iti kramākramayor anyo 'nyavyavacchedena sthitatvād etat prakāradvayaparihāreṇārthākriyakāritvam anyatra na gatam ity arthaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:77_1: na hy abhāvaḥ kaś cid vigrahavān yaḥ sākṣatkartavyaḥ,
SA15ratksanu:77_3: na hy abhāvasya vikalpād anyāpratipattir apratipattir vā sarvathā /
SA15ratksanu:77_5: evaṃ vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntasya hetuvyatirekasya ca vikalpād eva pratipattiḥ.
SA15ratksanu:78_1: vyāpakānupalambhena nirdoṣeṇa sattvasya kṣaṇikatvena vyāpter avyāhatatvāt /
SA15ratksanu:79_1: sattvasya tato vyatirekaṃ kṣaṇikatvena vyāptiṃ ca sādhayatyekavyāpārātmakatvād iti sthitam /
SA15ratksanu:80_0: (85.13) nanu vyāpakānupalabdhir iti yady anupalabdhimātraṃ tadā na tasya sādhyabuddhijanakatvam avastutvāt /
SA15ratksanu:80_1: na cānyopalabdhir vyāpakānupalabdhir abhidhātuṃ śakyā bhūtalādivad anyasya kasya cid anupalabdher iti cet /
SA15ratksanu:81_1: yathā hi neha śiṃśapā vṛkṣābhāvād ity atra vṛkṣāpekṣayā kevalapradeśasya dharmiṇa upalabdhir vṛkṣānupalabdhiḥ /
SA15ratksanu:81_2: śiṃśapāpeksayā ca kevalapradeśasya dharmiṇa upalabdhir eva śiṃśapāyā abhāvopalabdhir iti svabhāvahetuparyavasāyivyāpāro vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:81_3: tathā nityasya dharmiṇo vikalpabuddhyavasitasya kramikāritvākramikāritvāpekṣayā kevalagrahaṇād eva kramikāritvākramikāritvānupalambhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:81_4: arthakriyāpekṣayā ca kevalapratītir evārthakriyāyoga pratītir iti vyāpakānupalambhāntarād asya na kaś cid viśeṣaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:82_0: (85.22) adhyavasāyāpekṣayā ca bāhye 'kṣaṇike vastuni vyāpakābhāvād vyāpyābhāvasiddhivyavahāraḥ /
SA15ratksanu:82_1: adhyavasāyaś ca samanantarapratyayabalād āyātākāraviśeṣayogād agṛhīte 'pi pravartanaśaktir bodhavyaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:82_6: ayaṃ ca nyāyo yathā vastubhūte dharmiṇi tathā 'vastubhūte 'pīti ko viśeṣaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:83_0: (85.27) tathā hy ekajñānasaṃsargy atra vikalpya eva /
SA15ratksanu:83_2: śaśaśirasy api tena sahaikajñānasaṃsargitvasambhāvanayaiva śṛṅgaṃ niṣidhyate,
SA15ratksanu:83_3: tathā nīlādāv apariniṣṭhitanityānityabhāve kramākramau svadharmiṇā sārdham ekajñānasaṃsargiṇau dṛṣṭau,
SA15ratksanu:83_4: yadi nitye bhavataḥ nityagrāhijñāne svadharmiṇā nityena sahaiva gṛhyeyātām iti sambhāvanaya ekājñānasaṃsargadvārakam eva pratiṣidhyate /
SA15ratksanu:83_5: kathaṃ punar etasmin nityajñāne kramākramayor asphuraṇam iti yāvatā kramākramakroḍikṛtam eva nityaṃ vikalpayām iti cet.
SA15ratksanu:83_6: ata eva bādhakāvatāro viparītāropam antareṇa tasya vaiyarthyāt.
SA15ratksanu:84_2: tato nityatvasya kramākramikāryaśakteś ca parasparaparihārasthitilakṣaṇatayā durvāro virodha iti kathaṃ nitye kramākramayor antarbhāvaḥ.
SA15ratksanu:84_3: anantarbhāvāc ca suddhanityavikalpena dūrīkṛtakramākramasamāropeṇa katham ullekhaḥ.
SA15ratksanu:84_4: tataś ca pratiyogini nitye 'pi vikalpyamāne ekajñānasaṃsargilakṣaṇaprāpte nityopalabdhir eva nityaviruddhasyānupalabhyamānasya kramākramasyānupalabdhiḥ.
SA15ratksanu:84_6: tasmād vyāpakavivekidharmyupalabdhitayā na vyāpakānupalambhāntarād asya viśeṣaḥ.
SA15ratksanu:85_0: (86.13) nanv etad avastudharmikopayogi vastv adhiṣṭhānatvāt pramāṇavyavasthāyā iti cet.
SA15ratksanu:85_3: atha vastuni kena cid ākāreṇa vyavahārakāraṇatvam,
SA15ratksanu:86_0: (86.16) yady ādyaḥ pakṣas tadā kramākramasyārthakriyāyāś ca vyāptigrahaṇagocaravastupratibaddhatvam asyāpi.
SA15ratksanu:87_0: (86.18) na dvitīye 'pi pakṣe dosah sambhavati. kṣaṇabhaṅgivastu sādhanopāyatvād asya.
SA15ratksanu:88_1: tasyaiva nityavikalpasya vastuno dharmibhūtasya kramākramavad bāhyanityopādānaśūnyatvenārthakriyāvad bāhyanityopādānaśūnyatve prasādhanāt.
SA15ratksanu:89_0: (86.23) ayam eva nyāyo na vaktā vandhyāsutaś caitanyābhāvād ityādau yojyaḥ.
SA15ratksanu:89_1: etena yathā vṛkṣābhāvādir antarbhāvayituṃ śakyate na tathāyam iti trilocano 'pi nirastaḥ.
SA15ratksanu:90_0: (86.25) na ca kramādyabhāvas trayīṃ doṣajātiṃ nātikrāmati,
SA15ratksanu:91_0: (86.26) yat tvanena pramāṇāntarān nityānām asattvasiddhau kramādivirahasyābhāvadharmatā sidhyatīty uktam,
SA15ratksanu:91_1: tadvālasyāpi durabhidhānam. nityo hi dharmi. asattvaṃ sādhyam. kramikāryakāritvākramikāryakāritvaviraho hetuḥ.
SA15ratksanu:91_3: tac ca kramākrameṇa sattvasya vyāptisiddhau sattvasya vyāpyasyābhāvena kramākramasya vyāpakasya viraho vyāptaḥ sidhyatīty abhāvadharmatvaṃ prāg eva vidhyor vyāptisādhanāt pratyakṣād anumānād ekasmād vā pramāṇāntarāt siddham iti netaretarāśrayadoṣaḥ.
SA15ratksanu:92_0: (87.7) na ca sattāyām ivāsattāyām api tulyaḥ prasaṅgo bhinnanyāyatvāt.
SA15ratksanu:92_1: vastubhūtaṃ hi tatra sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca.
SA15ratksanu:92_2: tayor dharmy api vastv eva yujyate.
SA15ratksanu:93_2: asattāsādhane tv avastudharmo hetur avastu vikalpamātrasiddhe dharmiṇi nāśrayāsiddhidoṣeṇa dūṣayituṃ śakyaḥ.
SA15ratksanu:94_1: vikalpollikhitaś cāsya svabhāvo nāpara ity api vyavahartavyam.
SA15ratksanu:94_4: asti ca. ato yathā pramāṇābhāve 'pi vikalpasiddhasya vandhyāsutādeḥ saundaryādiniṣedho 'nurūpas tathā vikalpopanītasyaivākṣaṇikarūpasya tad eva pratyanīkākāreṇa saha virodhavyavasthāyāṃ kīdṛso doṣaḥ syāt.
SA15ratksanu:94_5: yadi cākṣaṇikānubhavābhāvāt virodhapratiṣedhas tarhi vandhyāputrādyanubhavād eva saundaryādiniṣedho 'pi mābhūt.
SA15ratksanu:95_1: taddvāreṇa kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhir apy apāramārthikī syād iti cet.
SA15ratksanu:96_0: (87.21) na hi virodho nāma vastvantaraṃ kiñcit ubhayakoṭidattapādasambandhābhidhānam iṣyate,
SA15ratksanu:96_2: yathā tv iṣyate tathā pāramārthika eva /
SA15ratksanu:96_6: nāpy abhāvo bhāvarūpaṃ praviśatīti yo 'yam anayor asaṃkaraniyamaḥ sa eva pāramārthiko virodhaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:97_0: (88.1) nanu nityatvaṃ kramayaugapadyavattvaṃ ca viruddhau dharmau vidhūya nāparo virodho nāma,
SA15ratksanu:98_0: (88.2) na, na hi dharmāntarasya sambhavena virodhasya pāramārthikatvaṃ brūmaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:98_2: anyathā virodhanāmadharmāntarasambhave 'pi yadi na viruddhau dharmau kva pāramārthikavirodhasambhavaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:98_3: viruddhau ced dharmau tāvataiva tāttviko virodhavyavahāraḥ /
SA15ratksanu:99_1: nityaṃ nāsti na vā pratītiviṣayas tenāśrayāsiddhatā hetoḥ svānubhavasya ca kṣatir ataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo 'pi ca /
SA15ratksanu:99_2: śūnyaś ca dvitayena sidhyati na vā 'sattā 'pi sattā yathā no nityena virodhasiddhir asatā śakyā kramāder api /
SA15ratksanu:100_0: (88.12) atra siddhāntasaṃkṣepaḥ / dharmasya kasya cid avastuni mānasiddhā bādhāvidhivyavahṛtiḥ kim ihāsti no vā /
SA15ratksanu:100_1: kvāpy asti cet katham iyanti na dūṣaṇāni nāsty eva cet svavacanapratirodhasiddhiḥ /
SA15ratksanu:101_0: (88.17) tad vam nityaṃ na kramikāryakāritvākramikāryakāritvayogīti paramārthaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:101_1: tataś ca sattāyuktam api naiveti paramārthaḥ /
SA15ratksanu:101_2: tataś ca kṣaṇikākṣaṇikaparihāreṇa rāśyantarābhāvād akṣaṇikān nivartamānam idaṃ sattvaṃ kṣaṇika eva viśrāmyatvena vyāptaṃ sidhyatīti sattvāt kṣaṇikatvasiddhir avirodhini /
SA15ratksanu:102_0: (88.21) prakṛtiḥ sarvadharmāṇaṃ yad bodhān muktir iṣyate /
